comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Before I saw this clip, I thought reincarnation was just a crackpot device we'd invented to make us feel better about laying down for the Big Nap. But to see Ella Fitzgerald come back in the form of this fifteen-year-old Canadian kid, whoa... Color me sold. DU

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: ...and Richard Dawson has been reincarnated as a French game show host.
